EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Jun06 ILTA PM
EmailTemplate.subject: CONFIRMATION: IntApp Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}: Thank you for registering for IntApp/ILTA webinar titled "Best practices for managing business process re-engineering projects."
Date: Thursday, June 29
Time: 2 pm (Eastern) / 11 am (Pacific)
Video:
Conference URL: http://e-meetings.mci.com/nc/join.php?i=SV56561&p=integration&t=c Conference/Meeting Number: SV56561 Conference/Meeting Passcode: integration
Audio:
Conference Audio Dial In: 888-677-5720 (give operator the conference leader's name: "John Hall" and password: "INTEGRATION")
Please log in and dial the conference audio line 10 minutes prior to the start time.
http://www.intapp.com
